tool_description: Initiates vendor registration by collecting basic company information, contact details, and required documentation for public procurement eligibility.

company_name.description: Official registered name of the vendor company

registration_country.description: Country where the company is legally registered

error_messages: Duplicate registration: A vendor with this tax_id already exists in the system.
Invalid tax_id format: Provide a valid tax identification number for the specified country.
Missing required information: company_name, tax_id, and registration_country are mandatory fields.
usage: Provide company_name, tax_id, and registration_country to initiate vendor registration. The tool creates a preliminary vendor record and generates a unique registration ID for tracking.

registration_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the vendor registration

status.description: Current registration status (pending, active, suspended, rejected)

submission_timestamp.description: Date and time when registration was submitted
